name: places/ChIJf0NOCKtZwokRkNcgriZwy4A
formattedAddress: 330 W 56th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 330 W 56th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Daisy came to Florida to help my wife recover after ablation surgery because my wife had extenuating issues that prevented an average recovery. 12 days she spent coordinating her care and keeping her focused and giving me space to deal with my anxiety. Worth every penny, she is gifted and I am so glad we hired her.

text.text: Daisy came to Florida to help my wife recover after ablation surgery because my wife had extenuating issues that prevented an average recovery. 12 days she spent coordinating her care and keeping her focused and giving me space to deal with my anxiety. Worth every penny, she is gifted and I am so glad we hired her.

originalText.text: The first thing that Daisy does is ask me how I am and she needs to know this information. She designs each and every lesson by what response I give. It's incredible. I met her through my to be wife, who has been a student of hers for many years. There aren't enough raves for me too write. Each day I work with her makes me feel better, and at 76 that ain't easy.

text.text: The first thing that Daisy does is ask me how I am and she needs to know this information. She designs each and every lesson by what response I give. It's incredible. I met her through my to be wife, who has been a student of hers for many years. There aren't enough raves for me too write. Each day I work with her makes me feel better, and at 76 that ain't easy.

originalText.text: I have known Daisy 20+ years ever since she was an apprentice at the New York Pilates studio. She took me on with a verve, and to this day has followed me to many places either in person or from a distance, working me out, keeping me flexible, and I can’t imagine my life without her.

text.text: I have known Daisy 20+ years ever since she was an apprentice at the New York Pilates studio. She took me on with a verve, and to this day has followed me to many places either in person or from a distance, working me out, keeping me flexible, and I can’t imagine my life without her.

originalText.text: I have Parkinson’s. Daisy and I have worked together since my diagnosis years ago. She personalizes each work out, coordinates with my PT’s and my OT’s. Each day she brings something to engage my body and my mind. She’s the Best!

text.text: I have Parkinson’s. Daisy and I have worked together since my diagnosis years ago. She personalizes each work out, coordinates with my PT’s and my OT’s. Each day she brings something to engage my body and my mind. She’s the Best!

originalText.text: In addition to improving my physical stamina and flexibility, Daisy has become a quasi life coach and friend.

text.text: In addition to improving my physical stamina and flexibility, Daisy has become a quasi life coach and friend.
